column5: I thought this was good for a chuckle..   <iframe width="420" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/tFgA0dMU7fg" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
thats not good if all the bridges are falling down....whatever will the apartment dwellers along highway 20 tie their clothslines to?...Mercman might notice a boom in dryer sales

Just a tip toe through the tulips for this city dweller The first pic is the Champlain Bridge.I always look up as troll under it So far so good, no chunks of falling concrete. I actually live 10 minutes from that pic,in Brossard, and fish that area alot.Good walley, SMB, Musky and Pike. I wouldnt live in Montreal center, if it was the last place in the universe. Its alot worse than the pictures show.
